config.autoTestEnabled: Enable automatic proxy connection testing in Auto mode. When enabled, proxy connectivity is tested periodically.
config.detectionSourcePriority: Priority order for proxy detection sources. Sources are tried in order until one succeeds.
config.enableFallback: Enable fallback to manual proxy when system proxy is not detected (Auto mode only)
config.maxRetries: Maximum number of retries for proxy detection when it fails.
config.pollingInterval: Auto mode polling interval in seconds (10-300). How often to check for system proxy changes.
config.proxyUrl: Proxy server URL (e.g., http://proxy.example.com:8080) for VSCode, Git, npm, and integrated terminal proxy settings
config.syncEnabled: Enable synchronization between multiple VSCode/Cursor instances
config.testInterval: Proxy connection test interval in seconds (Auto mode only). Range: 30-600 seconds. Default: 60 seconds.
